owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

assignee.description: Login for the user that this issue should be assigned to. _NOTE: Only users with push access can set the assignee for new issues. The assignee is silently dropped otherwise. **This field is closing down.**_

labels.description: Labels to associate with this issue. _NOTE: Only users with push access can set labels for new issues. Labels are silently dropped otherwise._

assignees.description: Logins for Users to assign to this issue. _NOTE: Only users with push access can set assignees for new issues. Assignees are silently dropped otherwise._

type.description: The name of the issue type to associate with this issue. _NOTE: Only users with push access can set the type for new issues. The type is silently dropped otherwise._
